full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Temporary Help Services

**Title**
* English: National Capital Region - Special Advisor - Temporary Help Services (Tenders S4669680)
* French: Région de la capitale nationale - Conseiller spécial - services d'aide temporaire (Appels d'offres S4669680)

**Reference Information**

* Last Amendment Number: 4
* Publication Date: 28 November 2023
* Tender Closing Date: 05 December 2023 10:00 AM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified
* Status: Expired

**Procurement Details**

* Category: Services - Temporary personnel services
* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Criteria: Lowest Cost-per-Point
* Region: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity and Security Level**

* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defense
* Security Level: Secret
* Trade Agreements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Attachments and Contact Information**

* Tender Description: [Temporary Help Services Requirement](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26103/s4669680-rfp-for-competitive-method-2_0.pdf)
* Contact: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
  - Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
  - Phone: (613) 971-7955

**Supply Arrangement Holders Invited to Submit Proposals**
